name: aggregateRoles
shortDescription: Aggregates values of variables with specific roles
description: This method aggregates values of variables with specific roles.
signatures: Struct aggregateRoles(Integer aggregationType, Integer roleId, Struct aggregationParameters [, Integer roomId = 0 [, Boolean visualizedVariablesOnly = false]])
Struct aggregateRoles(Integer aggregationType, Array<Integer> roleIds, Struct aggregationParameters [, Integer roomId = 0 [, Boolean visualizedVariablesOnly = false]])

parameters.name: aggregationType
parameters.description:
The type of aggregation to perform. Available aggregations:
  • 1: countTrue - Evaluates the variables to true and false (all variable types are evaluated) and counts the result.
  • 2: countDistinct - Counts all distinct number values.
  • 3: countMinimum - Counts all variables having their minimum value.
  • 4: countMaximum - Counts all variables having their maximum value.
  • 5: countBelowThreshold - Counts all variables below a threshold. The threshold value needs to be set in aggregationParameters to the key threshold.
  • 4: countAboveThreshold - Counts all variables above a threshold. The threshold value needs to be set in aggregationParameters to the key threshold.

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description: The role ID to get the variables to aggregate for.

parameters.name: roleIds
parameters.description: Multiple role IDs to get the variables to aggregate for.

parameters.name: aggregationParameters
parameters.description: Additional aggregation parameters. Required for some aggregations. See aggregationType if additional parameters are required.

parameters.name: roomId
parameters.description: If specified only variables within this room are aggregated.

parameters.name: visualizedVariablesOnly
parameters.description: Only count variables that are used in UI elements.

returnValue: Returns the aggregated values as a Struct.
